name: Pet Kitty Cat
description:
Adopt a virtual kitty cat! Take care of this cute little 8-bit fur ball by giving food and water, playing, bathing, dancing, and cleaning up. If you're not careful your furry pet can get sick, but you can give medicine to make it better. All the fun of a real pet without all the hassle! This is a great virtual animal pet and a super cute little kitten.

Features a simple interface with a retro feel.
